DOC.brief_summary: AIM : To assess efficacy intervention include assistance weight loss smartphone application target young people age 18 40 year . DESIGN : Randomisedclinical trial . SETTING : Primary Health Care centre ( PHCCs ) Catalonia . PARTICIPANTS : Adults age 18 40 year criteria obesity overweight , consult PHCCs reason provide write informed consent participate trial . INTERVENTION GROUP receive 12-month weight loss programme implement recommendation Clinical Practice Guideline , complement smartphone app design specifically programme . CONTROL GROUP receive usual care . The outcome measure weight loss 12 month . EXPECTED RESULTS : The investigator expect high weight loss intervention group control group .
